name: User Flow Creation Kit (v1.2)
description:
Put together this to make it easier to put together user flows, via the components system in Figma. Worked together on this with Bench since this was initially something we had when we used to work together in a company as a 2-person design team. 😁


Made this because I found the current available user flow kits and plugins on Figma lacking... in specific use cases? And this one was the one that worked best for me whenever I built user flows. Shared it with the Figma Community because it might also help others. 😊


Version 1.2

  • added stroke around notes (to help distinguish it from gray backgrounds)
  • added more note variants: simple note (the default one), note with header, and note with label
  • also removed the lines with a labeled variant, as after trying to use this, I realized adding labels to the end of the components will just flip the labels around 🙃
  • made the end caps public in the file, so you can make use of the labels in other places!


Version 1.1

  • added a label end component
  • updated all line types to include a labeled variant (with segments having either 1 or 2 labeled ends)


Version 1.0

  • includes the following line types: I, L, S, C, and U
  • includes solid and dashed lines
  • has a comment / note component that's aligned left, right, and center


Not really sure if there'll be other versions to this once it's out, but I figured I might as well list it here!
